result.ga: is é seo cathal mac donncha
result.orig: is é seo cathal mac donncha
result.html: is é seo cathal mac donnchaThis is Cathal MacDonncha.
result.ponchtml: is é seo caṫal mac donnċaThis is Cathal MacDonncha.

result.eng: I'm happy to meet you, Cathal.
result.ga: tá áthas orm casadh leat a chathail
result.orig: tá áthas orm casadh leat a chathail
result.html: tá áthas orm casadh leat a chathailI'm happy to meet you, Cathal.
result.ponchtml: tá áṫas orm casaḋ leat a ċaṫailI'm happy to meet you, Cathal.

result.eng: Will you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
result.ga: an mbeidh cupán tae agat a chathail
result.orig: an mbeidh cupán tae agat a chathail
result.html: an mbeidh cupán tae agat a chathailWill you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
result.ponchtml: an mbeiḋ cupán tae agat a ċaṫailWill you have a cup of tea, Cathal?
